item.description:
EDIT - Ok seems like noone is coming along? Tom is heading out on his own.
So if noone is coming to meet up to go I won't be there at the Marriott I'll just head down from Quincy
after I loop to Plymouth and do my shocks




http://scootercentral...

MORE ABOUT THE EXCITING PLACE WE ARE GOING "Join us for our 6th Annual Open House next Saturday, June 7th from 10 a.m. - 6 p.m. and be sure to bring your scoot!

At noon, we'll depart for a ride over hill and dale to Barkhampsted reservoir and return to Vespa Hartford around 2:30 p.m. for a barbeque starting at around 3 p.m. Be sure to return to the special scooter parking lot to take part in our contest for Best-Dressed Vespa, Best Overall Scooter, Best Plastic Scooter, Most Hideous, and more. We'll also feature a side-by-side "slow race" in our parking lot where the more "balanced" individuals among us will attempt to dethrone our own Doug Day for the 2008 Plainville Industrial Center World Championship."


---------------------------------------------

The side routes would take too long for to get down there (in my opinion) so lets haul some butt to get down there on either a mini superslab or a superslab

Anyone with anything that can go highway speeds would be good (55mph+). For those that can't there may be an alternate route to go down there.

so who's up for this?

Scooter Centrale
161 Woodford Avenue
Unit 54
Plainville, CT 06062
item.why: Have some quality time with your scoot and others!
item.name: Scoot Centrale Open House
